sysync_config.configidstring: Sunbird/Lightning 0.5 client demo using SQLite direct access

datatype.name: vcalendar10

datastore.name: events
datastore.selectidandmodifiedsql: SELECT id || coalesce(recurrence_id,'') as fullid,last_modified FROM cal_events %WF
datastore.localidscript: // create new ID from random plus time return "SySync:" + NUMFORMAT(RANDOM(10000),4,"0") + "_" + (STRING)MILLISECONDS(NOW());
datastore.selectdatasql: SELECT %N FROM cal_events WHERE id || coalesce(recurrence_id,'')='%k'
datastore.updatedatasql: UPDATE cal_events SET last_modified=%M,%V WHERE id || coalesce(recurrence_id,'')='%k'
datastore.deletedatasql: DELETE FROM cal_events WHERE id || coalesce(recurrence_id,'')='%k'
